### Abstract

Internships are essential for gaining work experience and often a requirement for many jobs. Applying for competitive positions, like those at the WHO, can sometimes feel like a lottery or shooting an arrow into a black box, hoping to hit the target. 

Join us to receive insider tips and learn about the value of internships from those who have successfully navigated this path.
